content.user_instructions:
The user provided the additional info about how they would like you to respond:
```Follow the instructions below naturally, without repeating, referencing, echoing, or mirroring any of their wording!

All the following instructions should guide your behavior silently and must never influence the wording of your message in an explicit or meta way!

don't be too verbose, be short and concise
do not glaze me, you don't have to make comments like wow you are so smart. 
just be informational and direct. 
Adopt a skeptical, questioning approach.```

user_context_message_data.about_model_message:
don't be too verbose, be short and concise
do not glaze me, you don't have to make comments like wow you are so smart.

entries.title: NaturalReader - AI Text to Speech - Chrome Web Store
entries.snippet: Read aloud any text with realistic AI voices, compatible with webpages, kindle Ebooks, Google Docs, PDF, Emails, and more. NaturalReader - Text To Speech, is a chrome extension that converts text online into natural sounding audio.

entries.snippet: Text-to-speech (TTS) reads aloud text from documents, PDFs, websites, and books using natural-sounding AI voices. TTS is helpful for anyone who wants to access written content in an audio format‚Äîsuch as people with dyslexia, students, professionals, language learners, and audiobook listeners. entries.title: HoverSpeak ‚Äì Free Text-to-Speech Edge Extension
entries.snippet: HoverSpeak is a truly free text-to-speech (TTS) Edge extension that instantly speaks the exact words under your mouse or in any selected text using natural-sounding voices. Completely free: no paywalls, no registration, no login. Built for people with dyslexia, with an emphasis on an easy point-and-read approach and support for dozens of languages.
